name: One Chamber
description:
In this FPS (First person shooter) you can move, look, and jump just like any other shooter, but if anyone shoots everyone shoots, if anyone reloads everyone reloads.

Players: 2-4 (Split Screen)

Controls: (requires controllers) RB = Shoot,  LB = Aim,   A = Jump,  Left Joystick = Move,
Right Joystick = Look,  X = Reload

Note:  If you are also interested in an 8 Player FPS, or at least a 6 Player FPS, please leave a comment.
